alert.note: Alert for Bayamon (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 18 at 4:51PM ADT until September 18 at 9:30PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Bayamon County in Puerto Rico... * Until 830 PM AST. * At 351 PM AST, gauge reports indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 1 to 1.5 inches per hour. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of mainstem rivers, creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Bayamon, Guaynabo, Sabana Seca and Candelaria. Flooding in Urb. Bella Vista and Jardines de Caparra. Serious flooding affecting structural integrity of bridges. Potential Landslides throughout vicinity but especially along Highways 812, 816, 8829, 830, 174 and 167. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...1-1.5 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
